00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct File *file;
00028     unsigned char buf[600];
00029     long n;
00030     FILE *out;
00031     long len;
00032     struct List *list;
00033 
00034     adfEnvInitDefault();
00035 
00036 
00037     /* create and mount one device */
00038     hd = adfCreateDumpDevice("newdev", 80, 11, 2);
00039     if (!hd) {
00040         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00041         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00042     }
00043     adfCreateFlop( hd, "empty", FSMASK_FFS|FSMASK_DIRCACHE );
00044 
00045     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00046     if (!vol) {
00047         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00048         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00049         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00050     }
00051 
00052     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00053 
00054     /* the directory */
00055     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00056     while(list) {
00057         printEntry(list->content);
00058         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00059         list = list->next;
00060     }
00061     freeList(list);
00062 
00063     /* write one file */
00064     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "moon_gif","w");
00065     if (!file) return 1;
00066     out = fopen("Check/MOON.GIF","rb");
00067     if (!out) return 1;
00068     
00069     len = 600;
00070     n = fread(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),len,out);
00071     while(!feof(out)) {
00072         adfWriteFile(file, n, buf);
00073         n = fread(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),len,out);
00074     }
00075     if (n>0)
00076         adfWriteFile(file, n, buf);
00077 
00078     fclose(out);
00079 
00080     adfCloseFile(file);
00081 
00082     /* the directory */
00083     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00084     while(list) {
00085         printEntry(list->content);
00086         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00087         list = list->next;
00088     }
00089     freeList(list);
00090 
00091 
00092 
00093 
00094 
00095 
00096 
00097 
00098     adfUnMount(vol);
00099     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00100 
00101     adfEnvCleanUp();
00102 
00103     return 0;
00104 }
